title: Wanindu Hasaranga becomes most expensive SL player in IPL history
content: Sri Lanka all-rounder Wanindu Hasaranga was sold to Royal Challengers Bangalore on Saturday (12) for Indian Rs. 10.75 crores after a closely fought bidding war.Hasaranga took a hat-trick at last yearâ€™s T20 World Cup.The Sri Lankan pair of Hasaranga and Dushmantha Chameera, joined RCB for the second part of IPL 2021. He was also the highest wicket-taker with 16 victims in eight matches at 5.20.
